title: The Just Sign the Check Edition
description:
Janus v. AFSME, installment loans, and AMLO’s election victory on this week's show with Felix Salmon, Anna Szymanski, and Emily Peck.
Podcast production by Daniel Schroeder and Max Jacobs.
